name: The Babysitter
summary_text: The events of one evening take an unexpected turn for the worst for a young boy trying to spy on his babysitter.

name: Beastly
summary_text: A modern-day take on the "Beauty and the Beast" tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

name: The Hustler
summary_text: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

name: The Wind Rises
summary_text: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

name: Speed 2: Cruise Control
summary_text: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
summary_text: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned U.S.S. Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis Planet to recover Spock's body.

name: Failure to Launch
summary_text: A thirty-something is still living with his parents until they hire an interventionist to help him graduate out of the house. That's when the fun begins.

name: Frank
summary_text: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

name: Super
summary_text: After his wife falls under the influence of a drug dealer, an everyday guy transforms himself into Crimson Bolt, a superhero with the best intentions, but lacking in heroic skills.

name: Delivery Man
summary_text: An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.

name: Pretty in Pink
summary_text: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

name: Slither
summary_text: A small town is taken over by an alien plague, turning residents into zombies and all forms of mutant monsters.

name: Machete Kills
summary_text: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

name: Andhadhun
summary_text: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: Felon
summary_text: A family man convicted of killing an intruder must cope with life afterward in the violent penal system.

name: Greyhound
summary_text: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

name: The Hunt
summary_text: Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.

name: Morning Glory
summary_text: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.

name: Beasts of No Nation
summary_text: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

name: Notes on a Scandal
summary_text: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her fifteen-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new "friend" also go well beyond a platonic friendship.

name: Shaolin Soccer
summary_text: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

name: The Words
summary_text: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.

name: A Perfect World
summary_text: Kidnapped boy Phillip Perry (T.J. Lowther) strikes up a friendship with his captor Butch Haynes (Kevin Costner): an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by honorable Texas Ranger "Red" Garrett (Clint Eastwood).

name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
summary_text: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she is being primed for an arranged marriage to an English suitor.

name: Confessions of a Shopaholic
summary_text: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.

name: Sex and the City 2
summary_text: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

name: The Invasion
summary_text: As a Washington, D.C. psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.

name: Phenomenon
summary_text: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

name: Caché
summary_text: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

name: Species
summary_text: A group of scientists try to track down and trap a killer alien seductress before she successfully mates with a human.

name: Chak De! India
summary_text: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

name: Love and Monsters
summary_text: Seven years after he survived the monster apocalypse, lovably hapless Joel leaves his cozy underground bunker behind on a quest to reunite with his ex.

name: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
summary_text: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

name: Fool's Gold
summary_text: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.

name: Star Trek: Nemesis
summary_text: The Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty. Captain Picard and his crew discover a serious threat to the Federation once Praetor Shinzon plans to attack Earth.

name: Shot Caller
summary_text: A newly released prisoner is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

name: Midnight Express
summary_text: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

name: Bad Lieutenant: Port of Call New Orleans
summary_text: Terence McDonagh is a drug- and gambling-addled detective in post-Katrina New Orleans investigating the killing of five Senegalese immigrants.

name: Cabin Fever
summary_text: Five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

name: The Long Kiss Goodnight
summary_text: Samantha Caine lives in a small town with her daughter. Eight years ago she emerged, two months pregnant, from a nearby river with no memory of her past or who she is. However, she's getting closer to finding out about her past.

name: Breathless
summary_text: A small-time thief steals a car and impulsively murders a motorcycle policeman. Wanted by the authorities, he reunites with a hip American journalism student and attempts to persuade her to run away with him to Italy.

name: Rock of Ages
summary_text: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

name: The Bridges of Madison County
summary_text: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

name: A Wednesday
summary_text: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

name: The Fourth Kind
summary_text: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.

name: This Is Where I Leave You
summary_text: After their father passes away, four grown siblings are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof for a week, along with their over-sharing mother and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens.

name: Space Cowboys
summary_text: When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

name: Audition
summary_text: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.

name: 88 Minutes
summary_text: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

name: Hostiles
summary_text: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

name: Inkheart
summary_text: A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.

name: Out of Africa
summary_text: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

name: Shaft
summary_text: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

name: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)
summary_text: A mad scientist kidnaps and mutilates a trio of tourists in order to reassemble them into a human centipede, created by stitching their mouths to each others' rectums.

name: G.I. Jane
summary_text: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

name: Doomsday
summary_text: A futuristic action thriller where a team of people work to prevent a disaster threatening the future of the human race.

name: Into the Blue
summary_text: A group of divers find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after they come upon the illicit cargo of a sunken airplane.

name: Spenser Confidential
summary_text: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate, Hawk, to take down criminals.

name: Jackie
summary_text: Following the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, First Lady Jacqueline Kennedy fights through grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define her husband's historic legacy.

name: Kids
summary_text: A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.

name: Assault on Precinct 13
summary_text: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together to protect themselves on New Year's Eve, just as corrupt policeman surround the station with the intent of killing all to keep their deception in the ranks.

name: Project Power
summary_text: When a pill that gives its users unpredictable superpowers for five minutes hits the streets of New Orleans, a teenage dealer and a local cop must team with an ex-soldier to take down the group responsible for its creation.

name: Christine
summary_text: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

name: Killer Joe
summary_text: When a debt puts a young man's life in danger, he turns to putting a hit out on his evil mother in order to collect the insurance.

name: Red Dawn
summary_text: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

name: Practical Magic
summary_text: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

name: Trolls
summary_text: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

name: House at the End of the Street
summary_text: After moving with her mother to a small town, a teenager finds that an accident happened in the house at the end of the street. Things get more complicated when she befriends a boy. A double murder is not an accident.

name: My Girl
summary_text: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

name: Disconnect
summary_text: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.

name: Six Days Seven Nights
summary_text: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

name: The Last Castle
summary_text: A court-martialed General rallies together twelve hundred inmates to rise against a corrupt and sadistic warden.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
summary_text: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Before I Go to Sleep
summary_text: A woman wakes up every day, remembering nothing as a result of a traumatic accident in her past. One day, new terrifying truths emerge that force her to question everyone around her.

name: American Assassin
summary_text: After the death of his girlfriend at the hands of terrorists, Mitch Rapp is drawn into the world of counterterrorism, mentored by tough-as-nails former U.S. Navy S.E.A.L. Stan Hurley.

name: Premonition
summary_text: A depressed woman learns that her husband was killed in a car accident the previous day, then awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home; then awakens the day after that to find that he's dead.

name: What's Your Number?
summary_text: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

name: Fearless
summary_text: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

name: Four Lions
summary_text: Four incompetent British terrorists set out to train for and commit an act of terror.

name: Black Book
summary_text: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

name: Saturday Night Fever
summary_text: Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.

name: Lady Vengeance
summary_text: After being wrongfully imprisoned for thirteen years and having her child taken away from her, a woman seeks revenge through increasingly brutal means.

name: Paprika
summary_text: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all Hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

name: Girl with a Pearl Earring
summary_text: A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.

name: A Most Wanted Man
summary_text: A Chechen Muslim illegally immigrates to Hamburg, where he gets caught in the international war on terror.

name: Wanderlust
summary_text: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

name: Drishyam
summary_text: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Youth
summary_text: A retired orchestra conductor is on vacation with his daughter and his film director best friend in the Alps when he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday.

name: Backdraft
summary_text: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

name: Awake
summary_text: A wealthy young man undergoing heart transplant surgery discovers that the surgical team intend to murder him.

name: The Midnight Sky
summary_text: This post-apocalyptic tale follows Augustine, a lonely scientist in the Arctic, as he races to stop Sully and her fellow astronauts from returning home to a mysterious global catastrophe.

name: Seventh Son
summary_text: When Mother Malkin, the queen of evil witches, escapes the pit she was imprisoned in by professional monster hunter Spook decades ago and kills his apprentice, he recruits young Tom, the seventh son of the seventh son, to help him.

name: Volcano
summary_text: A volcano erupts in downtown Los Angeles and a city official and a seismologist try to stop its inevitable flow through the city.

name: Blockers
summary_text: Three parents try to stop their daughters from losing their virginity on prom night.

name: Enter the Void
summary_text: An American drug dealer living in Tokyo is betrayed by his best friend and killed in a drug deal. His soul, observing the repercussions of his death, seeks resurrection.

name: Hitchcock
summary_text: The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.

name: George of the Jungle
summary_text: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

name: Reis
summary_text: A drama about the early life of Recep Tayyip Erdogan, the president of Turkey, focusing on his childhood in Istanbul, his political career as the mayor of Istanbul from 1994 to 1998, and his short imprisonment in 1999.

name: Youth in Revolt
summary_text: While his trailer trash parents teeter on the edge of divorce, Nick Twisp sets his sights on dream girl Sheeni Saunders, hoping that she'll be the one to take away his virginity.

name: Paterson
summary_text: A quiet observation of the triumphs and defeats of daily life, along with the poetry evident in its smallest details.

name: Collateral Damage
summary_text: After his family is killed by a terrorist act, a firefighter goes in search of the one responsible.

name: 21 & Over
summary_text: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.

name: Deliver Us from Evil
summary_text: New York police officer Ralph Sarchie investigates a series of crimes. He joins forces with an unconventional priest, schooled in the rites of exorcism, to combat the possessions that are terrorizing their city.

name: Café Society
summary_text: In the 1930s, a Bronx native moves to Hollywood and falls in love with a young woman who is seeing a married man.

name: Amistad
summary_text: In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.

name: The African Queen
summary_text: In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.

name: Outlander
summary_text: During the reign of the Vikings, Kainan, a man from a far-off world, crash lands on Earth, bringing with him an alien predator known as the Moorwen. Though both man and monster are seeking revenge for violence committed against them, Kainan leads the alliance to kill the Moorwen by fusing his advanced technology with the Viking's Iron Age weaponry.

name: The Haunting
summary_text: A study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

name: The Water Diviner
summary_text: An Australian man travels to Turkey after the Battle of Gallipoli to try and locate his three missing sons.

name: 48 Hrs.
summary_text: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a wise-cracking criminal temporarily paroled to him, in order to track down a killer.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
summary_text: A psychiatrist familiar with knife-wielding dream demon Freddy Krueger helps teens at a mental hospital battle the killer who is invading their dreams.

name: What If
summary_text: Wallace, who is burned out from a string of failed relationships, forms an instant bond with Chantry, who lives with her longtime boyfriend. Together, they puzzle out what it means if your best friend is also the love of your life.

name: Candyman
summary_text: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.

name: The Manchurian Candidate
summary_text: A former prisoner of war is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

name: Harold and Maude
summary_text: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

name: The Wedding Ringer
summary_text: Two weeks shy of his wedding, a socially awkward guy enters into a charade by hiring the owner of a company that provides best men for grooms in need.

name: The Black Dahlia
summary_text: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the "Black Dahlia" Elizabeth Short murder investigation.

name: Dark Skies
summary_text: As the Barrett family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them, one which may have arrived from beyond the stars.

name: Whatever Works
summary_text: A middle-aged, misanthropic divorcée from New York City surprisingly enters a fulfilling, Pygmalion-type relationship with a much younger, unsophisticated Southern girl.

name: Footloose
summary_text: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: The Wicker Man
summary_text: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the locals claim never existed.

name: Office Christmas Party
summary_text: When his uptight CEO sister threatens to shut down his branch, the branch manager throws an epic Christmas party in order to land a big client and save the day, but the party gets way out of hand...

name: Ong-Bak: The Thai Warrior
summary_text: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.

name: No Reservations
summary_text: The life of a top chef changes when she becomes the guardian of her young niece.

name: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
summary_text: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

name: Walking Tall
summary_text: A former U.S. soldier returns to his hometown to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which prompts him to clean house.

name: Jaws 2
summary_text: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

name: Star Trek: Insurrection
summary_text: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

name: Crawl
summary_text: A young woman, while attempting to save her father during a category 5 hurricane, finds herself trapped in a flooding house and must fight for her life against alligators.

name: Freedom Writers
summary_text: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves and pursue education beyond high school.

name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
summary_text: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

name: A Very Long Engagement
summary_text: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

name: The Iceman
summary_text: The story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters had any clue about his real profession.

name: Derailed
summary_text: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

name: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone
summary_text: A veteran Vegas magician tries to revive his career after his longtime partner quits, he gets fired from his casino act, and an edgy new "street magician" steals his thunder.

name: The Ruins
summary_text: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

name: 40 Days and 40 Nights
summary_text: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

name: Bottle Rocket
summary_text: Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.

name: Dragonball Evolution
summary_text: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.

name: Doctor Zhivago
summary_text: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

name: Judgment at Nuremberg
summary_text: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

name: Underworld: Blood Wars
summary_text: Vampire death dealer Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

name: Paris, je t'aime
summary_text: Through the neighborhoods of Paris, love is veiled, revealed, imitated, sucked dry, reinvented and awakened.

name: Mission to Mars
summary_text: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster after reporting an unidentified structure, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.

name: Quarantine
summary_text: A television reporter and her cameraman are trapped inside a building quarantined by the CDC, after the outbreak of a mysterious virus which turns humans into bloodthirsty killers.

name: Blindness
summary_text: A city is ravaged by an epidemic of instant white blindness.

name: Escape from L.A.
summary_text: Snake Plissken is once again called in by the United States government to recover a potential doomsday device from Los Angeles, now an autonomous island where undesirables are deported.

name: The Peanut Butter Falcon
summary_text: Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
summary_text: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

name: Ghost Town
summary_text: Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

name: What to Expect When You're Expecting
summary_text: Follows the lives of five interconnected couples as they experience the thrills and surprises of having a baby and realize that no matter what you plan for, life does not always deliver what is expected.

name: The Spy Who Dumped Me
summary_text: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.

name: Surf's Up
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

name: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed & Fabulous
summary_text: After Cheryl Frasier (Heather Burns) and Stan Fields (William Shatner) are kidnapped, Gracie Hart (Sandra Bullock) goes undercover in Las Vegas, Nevada to find them.

name: Christopher Robin
summary_text: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

name: Splash
summary_text: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

name: Charade
summary_text: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
summary_text: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

name: Ikiru
summary_text: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

name: Midway
summary_text: The story of the Battle of Midway, told by the leaders and the sailors who fought it.

name: Mile 22
summary_text: A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

name: Chloe
summary_text: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

name: Oldboy
summary_text: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

name: Jigsaw
summary_text: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for over 10 years.

name: Portrait of a Lady on Fire
summary_text: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

name: Free Willy
summary_text: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

name: Sunshine Cleaning
summary_text: In order to raise the tuition to send her young son to private school, a mom starts an unusual business -- a biohazard removal/crime scene clean-up service -- with her unreliable sister.

name: Father of the Bride
summary_text: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

name: Solomon Kane
summary_text: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.

name: Bridget Jones's Baby
summary_text: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. In a twist, she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
summary_text: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

name: 12 Strong
summary_text: 12 Strong tells the story of the first Special Forces team deployed to Afghanistan after 9/11; under the leadership of a new captain, the team must work with an Afghan warlord to take down the Taliban.

name: The Infiltrator
summary_text: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

name: The 'Burbs
summary_text: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block are part of a murderous Satanic cult.

name: Dreamgirls
summary_text: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

name: Bewitched
summary_text: Thinking he can overshadow an unknown actress in the part, an egocentric actor unknowingly gets a witch cast in an upcoming television remake of the classic sitcom Bewitched (1964).

name: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
summary_text: A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.

name: Lost in Space
summary_text: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

name: Upside Down
summary_text: Adam and Eden fell in love as teens despite the fact that they live on twinned worlds with gravities that pull in opposite directions. Ten years after a forced separation, Adam sets out on a dangerous quest to reconnect with his love.

name: Norbit
summary_text: A mild-mannered guy, who is married to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

name: Trollhunter
summary_text: A group of students investigates a series of mysterious bear killings, but learns that there are much more dangerous things going on. They start to follow a mysterious hunter, learning that he is actually a troll hunter.

name: Mercury Rising
summary_text: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

name: The Postman
summary_text: A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.

name: Speed Racer
summary_text: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

name: Another Round
summary_text: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

name: Unfriended
summary_text: A group of online chat room friends find themselves haunted by a mysterious, supernatural force using the account of their dead friend.

name: The White Ribbon
summary_text: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

name: Death Sentence
summary_text: Nick Hume is a mild-mannered executive with a perfect life, until one gruesome night he witnesses something that changes him forever. Transformed by grief, Hume eventually comes to the disturbing conclusion that no length is too great when protecting his family.

name: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
summary_text: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

name: In the Valley of Elah
summary_text: A retired military investigator works with a police detective to uncover the truth behind his son's disappearance following his return from a tour of duty in Iraq.

name: [Rec]²
summary_text: In order to ascertain the current situation inside, a supposed medical officer and a GEO team step into the quarantined and ill-fated apartment building.

name: My Left Foot
summary_text: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

name: The Siege
summary_text: The secret U.S. abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York City, which leads to the declaration of martial-law.

name: Nanny McPhee
summary_text: A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.

name: Three Amigos!
summary_text: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

name: The Kissing Booth
summary_text: A high school student is forced to confront her secret crush at a kissing booth.

name: First Knight
summary_text: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary_text: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Frozen
summary_text: Three skiers stranded on a chairlift are forced to make life-or-death choices, which prove more perilous than staying put and freezing to death.

name: The Mountain Between Us
summary_text: Stranded after a tragic plane crash, two strangers must forge a connection to survive the extreme elements of a remote snow-covered mountain. When they realize help is not coming, they embark on a perilous journey across the wilderness.

name: The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest
summary_text: Lisbeth is recovering in a hospital and awaiting trial for three murders when she is released. Mikael must prove her innocence, but Lisbeth must be willing to share the details of her sordid experiences with the court.

name: In the Heat of the Night
summary_text: A black police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

name: Ninja Assassin
summary_text: A young ninja turns his back on the orphanage that raised him, leading to a confrontation with a fellow ninja from the clan.

name: The Edge
summary_text: An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

name: Fighting with My Family
summary_text: A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.

name: Richard Jewell
summary_text: Security guard Richard Jewell is an instant hero after foiling a bomb attack at the 1996 Atlanta Olympics, but his life becomes a nightmare when the FBI leaks to the media that he is a suspect in the case.

name: The Sitter
summary_text: A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.

name: Mortdecai
summary_text: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part-time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost gold.

name: Blue Ruin
summary_text: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. Proving himself an amateur assassin, he winds up in a brutal fight to protect his estranged family.

name: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
summary_text: A mature Queen Elizabeth endures multiple crises late in her reign including court intrigues, an assassination plot, the Spanish Armada, and romantic disappointments.

name: Made of Honor
summary_text: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.

name: Wolf Creek
summary_text: Three backpackers stranded in the Australian outback are plunged inside a hellish nightmare of insufferable torture by a sadistic psychopathic local.

name: Cobra
summary_text: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
summary_text: Before being sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends take one last road trip, but when they get into an accident, a terrifying experience will take them to a secluded house of horrors, with a chainsaw-wielding killer.

name: High Tension
summary_text: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

name: A Perfect Getaway
summary_text: Two pairs of lovers on a Hawaiian vacation discover that psychopaths are stalking and murdering tourists on the islands.

name: Just Married
summary_text: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

name: Nikita
summary_text: Convicted felon Nikita, instead of going to jail, is given a new identity and trained, stylishly, as a top secret spy/assassin.

name: MASH
summary_text: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

name: God Bless America
summary_text: On a mission to rid society of its most repellent citizens, terminally ill Frank makes an unlikely accomplice in 16-year-old Roxy.

name: Walk Hard: The Dewey Cox Story
summary_text: Singer Dewey Cox overcomes adversity to become a musical legend.

name: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
summary_text: A British writer struggles to fit in at a high-profile magazine in New York City.

name: Fried Green Tomatoes
summary_text: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

name: Hannah and Her Sisters
summary_text: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

name: Triple 9
summary_text: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

name: The Dirty Dozen
summary_text: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

name: Elizabethtown
summary_text: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

name: Capharnaüm
summary_text: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

name: Strange Days
summary_text: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

name: The Thirteenth Floor
summary_text: A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.

name: Europa Report
summary_text: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.

name: xXx: State of the Union
summary_text: Darius Stone, a new agent in the xXx program, is sent to Washington, D.C. to stop a coup attempt against the President of the United States.

name: The Science of Sleep
summary_text: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

name: Dumbo
summary_text: A young elephant, whose oversized ears enable him to fly, helps save a struggling circus, but when the circus plans a new venture, Dumbo and his friends discover dark secrets beneath its shiny veneer.

name: Love Me If You Dare
summary_text: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

name: The Station Agent
summary_text: When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

name: Daylight
summary_text: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

name: La Dolce Vita
summary_text: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.

name: Open Range
summary_text: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: The Remains of the Day
summary_text: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

name: A Most Violent Year
summary_text: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

name: The Night Before
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, three lifelong friends spend the night in New York City looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

name: A Lot Like Love
summary_text: Unacquainted Emily and Oliver join the mile-high club together on the way from LAX to NYC--end of story. Except that they keep meeting constantly over the next seven years..

name: Changing Lanes
summary_text: The story of what happens one day in New York City, when a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident on F.D.R. Drive, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

name: Kiss the Girls
summary_text: Police hunting for a serial kidnapper are helped when a victim manages to escape for the first time.

name: Be Cool
summary_text: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive on the way.
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

name: Johnny Mnemonic
summary_text: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
summary_text: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

name: Go
summary_text: The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.
